name: YUI BY N3XU5 51R
description: YUI is a whatsapp bot made by nexusNw to make fun and instresing in use of whatsapp.

YUI_SESSION.description: Type here your Session code here . (code got frm scanning the qr)

SUDO.description: Leave blank if you don't know how to use it! Sudo mode; Your number must be an international number. So you should have your number after the country code. Example: 91**********,0(Indian number 91)

LANGUAGE.description: only en & ml language is available

WEL_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BYE_GIF.description: Fill here any gif link if you selected gif as WEELCOME

BGM_FILTER.description: If you likes bgm you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

ANTİ_LİNK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

PM_BLOCK.description: Link Engelleme Sistemi. Link Blocking System.

STICKER_REPLY.description: if you need Automatic sticker reply type'true'. Otherwise false

NUMBER.description: give your orginal phone number if you wish to add it in .number cmnd

BAD_WORDS.description: enter the word you dont allow in your group

OWNER_NAME.description: reply for .owner ! give your details, Use => default, to change back.

ALL_LINK_BAN.description: Link Blocking System.- this one blocks all link

NO_LOG.description: Set true if you don't want to see error log.

SEND_READ.description: Write true if you want to throw seen.

ALL_CAPTION.description: Caption for images and videos generated by pinky bot

HEROKU.description: If it is running in Heroku, type true.

CHAT_BOT.description: Turn your account into a chatbot!

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Mute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Choose in which chat the bot won't work there. Ex: type grp or person jid here ,like-> 905xxxx && 905xxxx-1xxx or 905xxxx,905xxx...

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unmute Message! Use => default, to change back.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Block Message! Use => default, to change back.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Unblock Message! Use => default, to change back.

WORK_TYPE.description: YUI Working Type. If you use “public”, everyone can use the bot. Else if you use “private”, only you can use your bot. and if you use “admin”, only admin can use bot and not all feature (only features needed to maintain a standerd group)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Heroku APP Name.(name same as which you filled the very first colomn

DEBUG.description: For owners, dont change if you dont this thing.

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: If you dont have api key , tale it from here- https://remove.bg

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Alive Message! use {pp} if you want to add profile picture also add {qt} if you want to add qoutes in your alive message

BAN_MESSAGE.description: Customizable kick Message! Use => default, to change back.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Add Message! Use => default, to change back.

KICKME_MESSAGE.description: Customizable leave Message! Use => default, to change back.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Promote Message! Use => default, to change back.

CHANGE_BGM_TO.description: Dont leave this blank choose the bgm you need - enter one or two

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: Customizable Demote Message! Use => default, to change back.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: Customizable AFK Message! Use => default, to change back.

TAG_REPLY.description: Enter jid of your number so that you get a audio reply when metioned example - 91xxxxxxxxxx@s.whatsapp.net - for india

NO_ONLINE.description: Type true if you don't want to appear online.
